name: Pixel Fight (Vgamer)
description:
A game where you fight your frienemy, your friend/enemy, using pixel characters. These character are on the blue and orange team, every time you reload the game, and new background appears. enjoy hating your friends.

I lost the source code so I don't think I will able to change the game unless I decide to make it again, which I am to lazy to do, but HEY its free!

Controls:
Blue - WASD for movement and space to fire

Orange - Arrow Keys for movement and left control to fire.

First to 20 wins, need to restart the game in order to play again sadly.
